flawed_nl_solution:
He gets his pool cleaned 30/3=<<30/3=10>>10 times a month
Each time he gets it cleaned he tips 150*0.1=$<<150*0.1=51>>51
So he pays 150+51=$<<150+51=201>>201
So he pays 201*10=$<<201*10=2010>>2010 a month on cleaning
The chemicals cost 200*2=$<<200*2=400>>400
So in total, he pays 2010+400=$<<2010+400=2410>>2410

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15.0, not 51.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
